imagePullSecrets.title: imagePullSecrets

database.description: The database name to be used when using the integrated MariaDB database.
database.title: database

password.description: The password credential to be used when using the integrated MariaDB database.
password.title: password

username.description: The username credential to be used when using the integrated MariaDB database.

enabled.description: enable integrated MariaDB™ subchart from Bitnami

password.description: The password credential to be used when using the integrated RabbitMQ.

enabled.description: enable integrated Redis™ subchart from Bitnami
enabled.title: enabled

database.description: The database name to be used when using an external MariaDB database. Will be ignored when you activate the integrated database with mariadb.enabled.
database.title: database

existingSecret.description: Use existing secret for password details (`squest.config.database.auth.password` and `squest.config.database.auth.rootPassword` will be ignored and picked up from this secret). The secret has to contain the keys `mariadb-password` and `mariadb-root-password`.
existingSecret.title: existingSecret

password.description: The password credential to be used when using an external MariaDB database.
password.title: password

rootPassword.description: The root password credential to be used when using an external MariaDB database.
rootPassword.title: rootPassword

username.description: The username credential to be used when using an external MariaDB database.
username.title: username

host.description: The host name of the database server when using an external MariaDB database. Will be ignored when you activate the integrated database with mariadb.enabled.
host.title: host

port.description: The port in which the database service is running when using an external MariaDB database. Will be ignored when you activate the integrated database with mariadb.enabled.
port.title: port

gunicornWorkers.description: Number of workers used by Gunicorn process in charge of serving client connection. Increase the number of worker threads to serve more clients concurrently
gunicornWorkers.title: gunicornWorkers

dateFormat.description: Change the format of all date in Squest UI. Based on Python strftime. See https://strftime.org for a strftime cheatsheet.
dateFormat.title: dateFormat

timezone.description: Time zone of the server that host Squest service. See https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/4.2/ref/settings/#std:setting-TIME_ZONE for details.
timezone.title: timezone

fieldValidatorPath.description: Path to form field validation modules. It is deprecated. Please use squest.config.plugins.surveyValidatorPath instead.
fieldValidatorPath.title: fieldValidatorPath

existingSecret.description: Use existing secret for password details (`squest.config.rabbitmq.auth.password` will be ignored and picked up from this secret). The secret has to contain the key `rabbitmq-password`.
existingSecret.title: existingSecret

password.description: The password credential to be used when using an external database driver.
password.title: password

username.description: The username credential to be used when using an external database driver.
username.title: username

existingSecret.description: Use existing secret for password details (`squest.config.redis.auth.password` will be ignored and picked up from this secret). The secret has to contain the key `redis-password`.
existingSecret.title: existingSecret

password.description: The password credential to be used when using an external redis server.
password.title: password

username.description: The username credential to be used when using an external redis server.
username.title: username

existingSecret.description: Use existing secret for password details (`squest.config.smtp.auth.password` will be ignored and picked up from this secret). The secret has to contain the key `smtp-password`.
existingSecret.title: existingSecret

password.description: The password credential to be used when using an external SMTP host.
password.title: password

username.description: The username credential to be used when using an external SMTP host.
username.title: username

from.description: Domain name used as email sender.
from.title: from

host.description: The SMTP host to use for sending email.
host.title: host

port.description: Port to use for the SMTP server defined in squest.config.email.host.
port.title: port

useSsl.description: Whether to use an implicit TLS (secure) connection when talking to the SMTP server defined in squest.config.smtp.host.
useSsl.title: useSsl

admins.description: A list of all the email who get code error notifications when squest.config.django.debug=false
admins.title: admins

emailNotificationEnabled.description: Set to True to enable email notifications. The default is based on the squest.config.django.debug value.
emailNotificationEnabled.title: emailNotificationEnabled

host.description: Address of the Squest portal instance. Used in email templates and in metadata sent to Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform/AWX job templates.
host.title: host

isDevServer.description: Set to True to change the navbar and footer color to visually identify a testing instance of Squest.
isDevServer.title: isDevServer

maintenanceModeEnabled.description: When enabled, only administrators can access squest UI and API. This can be used for example to block new requests by end users from the service catalog. So an administrator can perform operations against the API like migrating instance specs.
maintenanceModeEnabled.title: maintenanceModeEnabled
